settings.heading: How It works{{ block.settings.page.title }}
settings.content:
1. Fill the reservoir with your choice of oil.
  2. Pump the dispenser to atomize the oil into a fine mist.
  3. Spray the oil evenly over your dishes for perfect flavor and texture.

settings.heading: FAQ
settings.content:
Q: Is the Glass Oil Sprayer easy to clean?

A: Definitely! Just wash it with warm, soapy water and let it dry completely before using it again.

Q: Can I use flavored oils in the dispenser?

A: Yes, you can! The Glass Oil Sprayer works well with various types of oils, giving you the freedom to try different flavors in your recipes.

Enhance your culinary experience with the Glass Oil Sprayer & Dispenser. Wave goodbye to messy and wasteful cooking, and embrace precision and sustainability!

settings.title: Dual Convenience
settings.text: Allows for both spraying and pouring oil, making it versatile for various cooking methods such as dressing, roasting,Â and grilling.

settings.title: Sealed Hygiene
settings.text: Designed to be leak-proof with a comfortable handle and prominent nozzle, ensuring a clean and mess-free experience without getting hands dirty.

settings.title: Healthier Cooking
settings.text: Helps control the amount of oil used, promoting healthier cooking habits by allowing precise oil measurement and usage.
